SmarterApp will be using GitHub as the source code repository for all applications. As a starting point, the source to SmarterApp.org website itself has been moved to GitHub Pages using Jekyll. Take a look at the SmarterApp repository there. You can even help build enhancements to the site.

Also, you can now subscribe to SmarterApp news by Feed or Email.
